CustomField.inlineHelpText: C. What Services were offered prior to removal: (for every checked item, please explain)

value.fullName: Monitored child safety through in-Home Services
value.label: Monitored child safety through in-Home Services

value.fullName: Connected family member to medical services/provided necessary monitoring
value.label: Connected family member to medical services/provided necessary monitoring

value.fullName: Connected (mother/father) to parenting classes/provided necessary monitoring
value.label: Connected (mother/father) to parenting classes/provided necessary monitoring

value.fullName: Connected (mother/father) to substance use disorder screening and treatment/provided necessary monitoring
value.label: Connected (mother/father) to substance use disorder screening and treatment/provided necessary monitoring

value.fullName: Connected family member to mental health services/provided necessary monitoring
value.label: Connected family member to mental health services/provided necessary monitoring

value.fullName: Other- specify (transportation, respire, child care, etc.)
value.label: Other- specify (transportation, respire, child care, etc.)
